caption.center: STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA v. THOMAS MITCHELL BROOKS.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 17th day of June 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th day of October 2008.Page 511
